Dear Mrs* Bacbfardt
1 m very happy to inform you officially that the Board of Directors of HAEB
has approved the application of the Office of the Los Angeles County Super¬
intendent of Schools for associate membership in our association*
fm will now be receiving regularly free us the monthly MB newsletter,
additional publications of interest, and many other things. Ion should, of
course, feel free to write to this office at any time for any information
concerning educational broadcasting.
Bader separate cover we are sending you a copy of the MEB Badio-Televiaion
which we hope you will find helpful*
Perhaps the greatest good of an HAEB membership is the associations you form*
It *s good to know that others are having the same problems you are and how
they are solving them* It has been the tradition with HAEB to exchange this
sort of information on a friend-to-*friend basis* Ioufll find lots of friends
In HAKE.
Sincerely yours,
Prank K. Schooley
